name: judge
description: Judge the provided answer against the reference answer

correct.description: Whether the provided answer is factually correct compared to the reference answer.

incorrectAnalysis.description: If the provided answer is incorrect, provide an analysis of why and how it is incorrect. If the provided answer is correct, this should be empty.

qualityScore.description: Evaluate the quality of the provided answer compared to the reference answer in terms of comprehensiveness, ease of understanding, and clarity and return a quality score from -2 (the provided answer has much lower quality) to 2 (the provided answer has much better quality). 0 means the answers have roughly equal quality.

qualityAnalysis.description: Provide an analysis that justifies the quality score.
